mapper.insert: insert into t_pl_materialrequisitionorder (materialRequisitionId, guardian, materialManager, picker, pickerDate, nowTime, batchingOrderId) values (#{materialRequisitionId},#{guardian},#{materialManager},#{picker},#{pickerDate},NOW(),#{batchingOrder.batchingOrderId});
mapper.select: select materialRequisitionId from t_pl_materialrequisitionorder order by nowTime desc ;
